bioAsHtml: Recently moving from southern California to Seattle, Washington, Adam Rosien is an Associate at Underscore ("The Scala Specialists"), focused on building systems using functional programming. He previously helped various startups in many domains develop back-end systems and implement continuous deployment practices, and also spent five years as a developer at Xerox PARC.
